mdRecord.dcterms:title: La vie treshorrificque du grand Gargantua, pere de Pantagrual / iadis co[m]posee par M. Alcofribas abstracteur de quinte essence. ; Liure plein de Pantagruelisme
Rabelais, François, approximately 1490-1553?. Gargantua
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rabelais, François, approximately 1490-1553? [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Bookplates of Max. Lud. de Clinchamp, De La Roche Lacarelle and Mortimer L. Schiff; with J. Coppinger, in gilt, top edge, inside front cover. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 700. [original]
